Question
========
A group of researchers is interested in experienced age discrimination and 
wants to know whether experienced age discrimination is influenced by a 
person's age. The expectation is that both younger and older people 
experience more age discrimination than middle-aged people. They analyze 
data from the European Social Survey from 2008/2009, which consists of data 
from 28 countries.

What is the **dependent variable** in this study?

Answerlist
----------
* Experienced age discrimination
* Age
* Country
* There is no dependent variable in this study

Solution
========










Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
